issue.title: Wrong number of falls testing VRC_Arenas_Q1

content.raw:
The fall detector doesn't look for new falls within 15 (simulation) seconds of a fall.  This is done to prevent counting a single fall event, which will involve many instances of high acceleration over a period of time, as multiple events.

In your video, at least one of the falls, around 5:40, happened right after another one, which would result in only one recorded fall.  I'm guessing that the same thing happened elsewhere in the run.
content.html:
The fall detector doesn't look for new falls within 15 (simulation) seconds of a fall. This is done to prevent counting a single fall event, which will involve many instances of high acceleration over a period of time, as multiple events.

In your video, at least one of the falls, around 5:40, happened right after another one, which would result in only one recorded fall. I'm guessing that the same thing happened elsewhere in the run.
